resources.string: Allows the application to provide a ScummVM loadable plugin: code that will be executed in the ScummVM application. Malicious plugins may do anything ScummVM itself could do: write to your SD card, delete your savegames, change the ScummVM background to puce, replace menu labels with rude words, etc.
Unable to read your SD card. This usually means you still have it mounted on your PC. Unmount, reinsert, whatever and then try again.
ScummVM requires at least one game engine to be useful. Engines are available as separate plugin packages, from wherever you found ScummVM.
